attributes.additional_details: I want this since people are going to go to poverty and uk will be poor and begars everywhere
attributes.background: Make the all the house bills cheaper for everyone

rejection.details:
It's not clear what bills you are concerned about, and what action you want the Government to take to reduce these. We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637663
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644887

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
